name: Go get some wisdom at Lima
description: VIsitor will have the unique experience to get to know Lima city on a different perspective. You will examine this city on a historical and intelectual perspective.We will talk about the roots of the city, going through the inca period the colonial one, and the modern times. We will talk, discuss and feel by our own means the effects of globalization and footprints of the different historical stages of a city that has always been important: first by its geographical importance and then by its enormous cultural inheritance(as the former center of different native culturales, and as the center of the spanish empire in South America) We will use a vocabulary not so widely used in common tralk,: words derivated from concepts such as terrorism, historical memoir and economic circuits will come out very easily in this trip. Anyway we will also have a lot of chances to enjoy the view and grab some food as well.
